US names new special envoy to Sudan in push to end warThe United States will appoint a new special envoy for Sudan on Monday, as Washington seeks to bring an end to a war that has wrecked parts of the country and killed tens of thousands. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 19:33:53 GMT YIDHKHVBTBJJRFCaUSVOGBK6X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/us-names-new-special-envoy-sudan-push-end-war-2024-02-26/Daphne Psaledakis世界非洲
Israel files report with World Court on Gaza measures, Israeli official saysIsrael on Monday filed a report with the International Court of Justice about measures taken to comply with an interim ruling that called on it to prevent Gaza war actions that might amount to genocide, an Israeli official said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:51:11 GMT 4EMUBGCUABMUJPKRKAUYGJAX4U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-files-report-with-world-court-gaza-measures-israeli-official-says-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
Visually impaired faithful explore Easter statues by fingertip in RondaAmanda Carreno knew Spain's Holy Week processions by the smell of the flowers, incense and candle wax or the sounds of trumpets and drums, but touching the centuries-old statues that are carried on elaborate floats gave it a whole new dimension. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:35:08 GMT L4VZVKGB6BPPFDE2TJ4YD7FXSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/visually-impaired-faithful-explore-easter-statues-by-fingertip-ronda-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Hungarian parliament elects top court chief as new presidentHungary's parliament elected Constitutional Court chief Tamas Sulyok as the country's next president on Monday, two weeks after the unexpected resignation of Katalin Novak. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:10:21 GMT S7QCCEOFORNQ5KCVQ55YU5FUHI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungarian-parliament-elects-top-court-chief-new-president-2024-02-26/Boldizsar Gyori世界欧洲
Israel committed to eradicating Hamas regardless of economic toll, minister saysIsrael is committed to winning the war in Gaza and eliminating Hamas regardless of the economic toll on the country, Economy and Industry Minister Nir Barkat said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:09:02 GMT FH5Y5IHSPRJ57LG4DCPDDI3ASA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-commited-eradicating-hamas-regardless-economic-toll-minister-says-2024-02-26/Alexander Cornwell世界中东
Peru to declare emergency in parts of country amid rise in dengue fever casesPeru will declare a health emergency in parts of the country in the midst of a hike seen in dengue fever cases, the South American country's health minister said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:02:52 GMT 4LCNYSD4ZVNMLGRWUGZ3K4JMOE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-declare-emergency-parts-country-amid-rise-dengue-fever-cases-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
Iran's uranium stock enriched to 60% shrinks but problems persist -IAEA papers sayIran's stock of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade has shrunk, bringing it below the theoretical threshold at which it could produce three atom bombs, but problems with inspectors persist, reports by the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:00:22 GMT JHSYNBYCGJKQ7H7MJXO27I5MQA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/irans-uranium-stock-enriched-60-shrinks-problems-persist-iaea-papers-say-2024-02-26/Francois Murphy世界中东
Mexico's president defends decision to share journalist's phone numberMexico's president on Monday shared a letter from the New York Times' bureau chief for Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean for the second time and defended his decision last week to share her private telephone number publicly. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:44:32 GMT 7FT4OTEBLVKV3FRR6V5HEPC6JQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicos-president-defends-decision-share-journalists-phone-number-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
Bird flu reaches mainland Antarctica for first time, scientists sayA deadly type of bird flu has been confirmed on the mainland of Antarctica for the first time, scientists said, a potential risk for the southern region's huge penguin colonies. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:41:35 GMT FLTV6EV4CZPT7FKH7ZAE63PASM https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/bird-flu-reaches-mainland-antarctica-first-time-scientists-say-2024-02-26/Adam Jourdan商业环境
Exclusive: Treasury says US warning to banks slows Russia financial flowsWashington's threat to hit foreign financial institutions with sanctions has made a significant difference in financial flows between Russia and countries such as Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and Kazakhstan, said Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:34:23 GMT TW6CB3UBEBPLJJEBEFJ5CPPAOE https://www.reuters.com/world/treasury-says-us-warning-banks-slows-Russia-financial-flows-2024-02-26/Daphne Psaledakis, David Lawder, Andrea Shalal世界
Russian editor defends decision to put Navalny on coverThe editor of a Moscow weekly said he stands by the decision to devote its front page last week to the death of Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, even though most of the print run was confiscated. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 16:56:17 GMT T24XB7UN3FK65ESDCV272Z4I2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-editor-defends-decision-put-navalny-cover-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
